n="c56-0066__main__22"/>M. Waldman inflicted torture when <lb n="c56-0066__main__23"/>he praisedwith<del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13700">the</del> kindness and warmth, <lb n="c56-0066__main__24"/>the astonishing progress that I had made <lb n="c56-0066__main__25"/>in the sciences. He soon perceived<mdel>my</mdel><lb n="c56-0066__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c56-0066__left_margin__d5e13717"/>that I<sga-add eID="c56-0066__left_margin__d5e13717"/><lb n="c56-0066__main__26"/> dislike <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13725"/>d <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13725"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13728">of</del>thesubject, butnot guessing <lb n="c56-0066__main__27"/>the realcausehe attributed<mdel>to</mdel> <mdel>it</mdel> <lb n="c56-0066__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c56-0066__left_margin__d5e13745"/>my feelings <sga-add eID="c56-0066__left_margin__d5e13745"/><lb n="c56-0066__main__28"/>to modesty <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13753">on hearing myself praised</del> <lb n="c56-0067__main__1"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13766">he therefore</del><lb n="c56-0067__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0067__left_margin__d5e13775"/>and<sga-add eID="c56-0067__left_margin__d5e13775"/>changed the subject from <lb n="c56-0067__main__2"/>myimprovement,to the science itself, <lb n="c56-0067__main__3"/>with<del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13783">an</del> a desireas I evidentlysaw<lb n="c56-0067__main__4"/>of drawing<del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13788">friend</del> me out. <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13791">K</del> Kind <lb n="c56-0067__main__5"/>friend he tortured me without but <lb n="c56-0067__main__6"/>it <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13807">How cruel is</del> What could I do? <lb n="c56-0067__main__7"/>He meant to please <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13813">and</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13816">me</del>& he<lb n="c56-0067__main__8"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13823">tortured</del> <lb n="c56-0067__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0067__left_margin__d5e13832"/>tormented <sga-add eID="c56-0067__left_margin__d5e13832"/> me <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13838">it was</del><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0067__main__d5e13841"/>I felt<sga-add eID="c56-0067__main__d5e13841"/>as if he<del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13846">had</del><lb n="c56-0067__main__9"/><lb n="c56-0067__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0067__left_margin__d5e13857"/>placed<sga-add eID="c56-0067__left_margin__d5e13857"/>carefullyone byone <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13860">placed</del>in my <lb n="c56-0067__main__10"/>view those instruments which were <lb n="c56-0067__main__11"/><lb n="c56-0067__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0067__left_margin__d5e13874"/>to be <sga-add eID="c56-0067__left_margin__d5e13874"/>afterwards used in putting me to a <lb n="c56-0067__main__12"/>slow and cruel<del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13879">dre</del> death. I writhed <lb n="c56-0067__main__13"/>under his words, yet dared not shew <lb n="c56-0067__main__14"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13887">my</del>the pain I felt. Clerval, whose <lb n="c56-0067__main__15"/>eyes and feelings were always quick <lb n="c56-0067__main__16"/>indi <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0067__main__d5e13894"/>s <sga-add eID="c56-0067__main__d5e13894"/>cerningthe sensations ofothers<lb n="c56-0067__main__17"/>declined thesubject alledging <mdel>in</mdel> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0067__main__d5e13904"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><sga-add eID="c56-0067__main__d5e13904"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0067__main__d5e13910"/>his<sga-add eID="c56-0067__main__d5e13910"/><lb n="c56-0067__main__18"/>ignorance& the conversation took <lb n="c56-0067__main__19"/>a more general turn. I thankedhim<lb n="c56-0067__main__20"/>from my heart, but I did not speak.<lb n="c56-0067__main__21"/> <longToken>I plainly saw</longToken>that he was surprised, <lb n="c56-0067__main__22"/>but he never attempted to draw <lb n="c56-0067__main__23"/>my secret fromme,and although <lb n="c56-0067__main__24"/>I loved him with a mixture of<lb n="c56-0067__main__25"/> <del rend="strikethrough" confide to him that event <lb n="c56-0067__main__28"/>which was so often present to my <lb n="c56-0067__main__29"/>thoughts,but which I feared the detail <lb n="c56-0067__main__30"/>to another would
